verses.verse: Joseph <WH3130> fell <WH5307> on his father <WH1>'s face, <WH6440> wept <WH1058> on him, <WH5401> and kissed him.
Joseph <WH3130> commanded <WH6680> his servants, <WH5650> the physicians, <WH7495> to embalm <WH2590> his father; <WH1> and the physicians <WH7495> embalmed <WH2590> Israel. <WH3478>

Forty <WH705> days <WH3117> were fulfilled <WH4390> for him, <WH4390> for that is how many the days <WH3117> it takes to embalm. <WH2590> The Egyptians <WH4714> wept for him for seventy <WH7657> days. <WH3117>

When the days <WH3117> of weeping <WH1068> for him were past, <WH5674> Joseph <WH3130> spoke <WH1696> to the house <WH1004> of Pharaoh, <WH6547> saying, <WH559> "If now I have found <WH4672> favor <WH2580> in your eyes, <WH5869> please speak <WH1696> in the ears <WH241> of Pharaoh, <WH6547> saying, <WH559>

<WH1> 'My father made me swear, <WH7650> saying, <WH559> "Behold, <WH2009> I am dying. <WH4191> Bury me in my grave <WH6913> which I have dug <WH3738> for myself in the land <WH776> of Canaan. <WH3667>" Now therefore, <WH6912> please let me go up <WH5927> and bury <WH6912> my father, <WH1> and I will come again. <WH7725>'"
Pharaoh <WH6547> said, <WH559> "Go up, <WH5927> and bury <WH6912> your father, <WH1> just like he made you swear. <WH7650>"

Joseph <WH3130> went up <WH5927> to bury <WH6912> his father; <WH1> and with him went up <WH5927> all the servants <WH5650> of Pharaoh, <WH6547> the elders <WH2205> of his house, <WH1004> all the elders <WH2205> of the land <WH776> of Egypt, <WH4714>

all the house <WH1004> of Joseph, <WH3130> his brothers, <WH251> and his father <WH1>'s house. <WH1004> Only their little ones, <WH2945> their flocks, <WH6629> and their herds, <WH1241> they left <WH5800> in the land <WH776> of Goshen. <WH1657>
There went up <WH5927> with him both chariots <WH7393> and horsemen. <WH6571> It was a very <WH3966> great <WH3515> company. <WH4264>

They came <WH935> to the threshing <WH1637> floor <WH1637> of Atad, <WH329> which is beyond <WH5676> the Jordan, <WH3383> and there they lamented <WH5594> with a very <WH3966> great <WH1419> and severe <WH3515> lamentation. <WH4553> He mourned <WH60> for his father <WH1> seven <WH7651> days. <WH3117>

When the inhabitants <WH3427> of the land, <WH776> the Canaanites, <WH3669> saw <WH7200> the mourning <WH60> in the floor <WH1637> of Atad, <WH329> they said, <WH559> "This is a grievous <WH3515> mourning <WH60> by the Egyptians. <WH4714>" Therefore, <WH8034> its name was called <WH7121> Abel Mizraim, <WH67> which is beyond <WH5676> the Jordan. <WH3383>
His sons <WH1121> did <WH6213> to him just as he commanded them, <WH6680>

for his sons <WH1121> carried <WH5375> him into the land <WH776> of Canaan, <WH3667> and buried <WH6912> him in the cave <WH4631> of the field <WH7704> of Machpelah, <WH4375> which Abraham <WH85> bought <WH7069> with the field, <WH7704> for a possession <WH272> of a burial <WH6913> site, <WH6085> from Ephron the Hittite, <WH2850> before <WH6440> Mamre. <WH4471>

Joseph <WH3130> returned <WH7725> into Egypt <WH4714>â€” he, <WH251> and his brothers, and all that went up <WH5927> with him to bury <WH6912> his father, <WH1> after <WH310> he had buried <WH6912> his father. <WH1>

When Joseph <WH3130>'s brothers <WH251> saw <WH7200> that their father <WH1> was dead, <WH4191> they said, <WH559> "It may be <WH3863> that Joseph <WH3130> will hate us, <WH7852> and will fully pay <WH7725> us <WH7852> back for all of the evil <WH7451> which we did to him. <WH1580>"
They sent a message <WH6680> to Joseph, <WH3130> saying, <WH559> "Your father <WH1> commanded <WH6680> before <WH6440> he died, <WH4194> saying, <WH559>

<WH577> 'You shall tell <WH559> Joseph, <WH3130> "Now please forgive <WH5375> the disobedience <WH2403> of your <WH577> brothers, <WH251> and their sin, <WH6588> because they did <WH1580> evil <WH7451> to you. <WH5375>"' Now, please forgive the disobedience of the servants <WH5650> of the God <WH430> of your father. <WH1>" Joseph <WH3130> wept <WH1058> when they spoke to him. <WH1696>
His brothers <WH251> also went <WH3212> and fell down <WH5307> before his face; <WH6440> and they said, <WH559> "Behold, <WH5650> we are your servants."
Joseph <WH3130> said <WH559> to them, <WH3372> "Don't be afraid, for am I in the place of God? <WH430>

As for you, <WH2803> you meant evil <WH7451> against me, <WH430> but God meant it <WH2803> for good, <WH2896> to <WH4616> bring to pass, <WH6213> as it is this day, <WH3117> to save <WH2421> many <WH7227> people <WH5971> alive. <WH2421>
Now therefore don't <WH3372> be afraid. I will nourish <WH3557> you and your little ones. <WH2945>" He comforted <WH5162> them, <WH1696> and spoke kindly to them. <WH3820>
Joseph <WH3130> lived <WH3427> in Egypt, <WH4714> he, <WH1> and his father's house. <WH1004> Joseph <WH3130> lived <WH2421> one hundred <WH3967> ten <WH6235> years. <WH8141>

Joseph <WH3130> saw <WH7200> Ephraim <WH669>'s children <WH1121> to the third <WH8029> generation. <WH1121> The children also of Machir, <WH4353> the son <WH1121> of Manasseh, <WH4519> were born on <WH3205> Joseph <WH3130>'s knees. <WH1290>

Joseph <WH3130> said <WH559> to his brothers, <WH251> "I am dying, <WH4191> but God <WH430> will surely <WH6485> visit <WH6485> you, <WH5927> and bring you up out of this land <WH776> to the land <WH776> which he swore <WH7650> to Abraham, <WH85> to Isaac, <WH3327> and to Jacob. <WH3290>"

Joseph <WH3130> took an oath <WH7650> of the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> saying, <WH559> "God <WH430> will surely <WH6485> visit <WH6485> you, <WH5927> and you shall carry up my bones <WH6106> from here. <WH2088>"
So Joseph <WH3130> died, <WH4191> being one hundred <WH3967> ten <WH6235> years <WH8141> old, <WH1121> and they embalmed <WH2590> him, <WH3455> and he was put in a coffin <WH727> in Egypt. <WH4714>
